column4: why wont ubuntu run /etc/bashrc or /etc/profile or /etc/bash.bashrc upon login? im tring to add some sysvars and none of those files are running when you login... ?
I mean, are you logging into gnome?
if you are logging into gnome, then none of those files should be sourced.  ~/.gnomerc is sourced though.  And /etc/bash.bashrc as well as ~/.bashrc get sourced when you open a terminal
